TextView.android:text: The match consists of two teams having 3 players each(depends on which pool your team is). Game will be played for 10 minutes. Match consists of 21 points.If a team scores 21 points before 10 minutes, the math will be considered over.If the ball goes out of the boundary, then ball will start from the start line. After every point scored, the opposite team will start game from the 3-point line.If shot attempted by attacking team touches ring, board or net, then defending team will have to take rebounded ball outside 3-point line during game play.If rebound is again taken by attacking team then they donâ€™t need to take the ball outside 3-point line.

There will be seperate fixtures of both the pools. Winner of POOL B will then play with only 2 of their 3 male players. The third player will be a girl(the girl can be either from any of the losing sides of POOL A or it can be any, depending completely on the discretion of the winner of POOL B). Thus, finals will be played between the winners of both the pools, thereby bringing out the ultimate winner.
